CustomField.description: Minimum number of days prior to the planned vaccine administration date that this vaccine should be administered. Example if the Planned Administration date is 10th June 2021 entering 5 would mean the earliest permissible date is 5th June 2021
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Minimum number of days prior to the planned vaccine administration date that this vaccine should be administered.
CustomField.label: Minimum Permissible Days Before
